para.text: In order to execute Dolphin applets within a web browser, a client must first install the Dolphin

. This is freely available for any browser running under Microsoft Windows that supports the Netscape Plug-in API. The reference platforms for testing have been Microsoft Internet Explorer 5 and Netscape Communicator 4.7. If you have not already done so, you can obtain the plug-in setup program from our
